Description:
Enjoy The Lifestyle You Deserve
FOR SALE BY FIXED DATE Tue 28th Aug 5pm.
This brand-new townhouse offers the ultimate in contemporary living, in low maintenance surrounds.
Set across two light filled levels, you’ll appreciate the quality of the fixtures and fittings that include modern plantation shutters and Black Butt timber floorboards.
On the lower level is an open plan space housing a generous living and dining area, plus an attractive hostess kitchen. Here you’ll be impressed to find stone benchtops, excellent storage space and sleek Bosch appliances that comprise a dishwasher, 2 x under bench ovens and an induction cooktop; a fully fitted laundry with further storage options is adjacent.
The sizeable master bedroom is also located on this level, boasting a fully fitted walk-in robe, a split system heating/air-conditioning unit and an ensuite with floor to ceiling tiling, a wall hung vanity with twin basins and an oversized shower with dual heads.
On the upper level there is a second living area, a private study and three further robed bedrooms with split systems that share use of a fully tiled central bathroom with twin basins, mirrored cabinets, a deep bathtub and a walk-in shower.
Outdoor living has been thoughtfully catered for, with an alfresco deck that enjoys a protected position under the homes roofline. Here you can relax happily or entertain family and friends, all whilst admiring the greenery of the lush grass and gardens that frame the space.
Additions including split system heating and air-conditioning , a lower level powder room, double glazed windows throughout, feature lighting and a double lock up garage with internal access will enhance the appeal further, as will the location which is popular, courtesy of its proximity to a range of sought after amenities including Eastfield Park, Eastfield Shopping Village, Croydon's Main Street shopping precinct, Aquahub Recreation Centre, Croydon Train Station, plus a number of schools including Dorset Primary, Tinternvale Primary and Tintern Grammar.
This stunning residence is shiny, new and ready for you, so inspect without delay and prepare to be impressed.
